import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; // import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import axios from "axios"; function Career() { const [career, setcareer] = useState({}); const careerdata = (e) => { let names = e.target.name; let value = e.target.value; setcareer({ ... career, [names]:value}) } const imagesupload = (e) => { var applyname = document.getElementById('applyname').value; let value = e.target.files[0]; setcareer({ ... career, 'resumefile':value,'apply':applyname}) } console.log(career) const formdatasubmit = async(e) => { if (career.resumefile && career.fullname && career.emailid && career.number && career.apply && career.fresher && career.position && career.qualification && career.vocation && career.joinwithin && career.message ) { // const { resumefile,fullname,emailid,number,apply,fresher,position,qualification,vocation,joinwithin,message } = career; const formdata = new FormData(); formdata.append(career) formdata.append('filess',career.resumefile) const formcareer = await fetch('/api/career',{ method: 'POST', headers:{ "Content-Type" : 'multipart/form-data' }, body:formdata }) }else{ e.preventDefault(); alert('all filed are requed'); } } return ( <>

Apply Now!

) } export default Career
